content.title: Twice a week
content.subtitle: 8 Private Lesson Package (60-min)
content.body:
Description:
  • 4 (60-minute) Private Lessons in person / month
  • 4 (60-minute) Online Conversation Sessions / month
  • 8 hours total for $399
  • 2.9% credit card fee
All 8 lessons must be redeemed within 31 days of the first lesson
